droid_missed: Hardcoded 10MB client-side limit ignores site settings, causing client/server divergence

key_findings: Bug 1 (duplicate downsize method): Both droid and golden caught this. Ruby method redefinition causes 4-arg callers to fail with ArgumentError.
Bug 2 (hardcoded 10MB limit): Only golden caught this. Changes from dynamic SiteSettings lookup to hardcoded value, breaking admin configurability.
Bug 3 (gifsicle percentage syntax): Both caught this. Droid attributed it to wrong cause (method signature) while golden correctly identified gifsicle --resize-fit needing WxH geometry.
validation_summary.droid_quality_notes: Droid achieved perfect precision (no false positives) but missed one bug. The bug it caught about the downsize call was valid but the reasoning was slightly off.
